word_mean: 准直管，准直仪，平行光管：由一吸收光的物质制成的隔光器或隔光器系统，用以限定放射线的方向和照射面
准直器在行三维立体定向伽玛射线全身治疗系统（体部伽玛刀）设定计划靶点测据。

sentence.Network_en: With a given collimator the integrated reflections in the parallel and antiparallel positions will be equal.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于一个给定的准直器,在平行和逆平行位置时积分反射是一样的.

sentence.Network_en: Multileaf collimator ( MLC ) is the indispensable equipment of IMRT.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为IMRT的必备设备,电动多叶光栅 ( MLC ) 有着举足轻重的作用.

sentence.Network_en: The efficiency of single - pinhole and multi - pinhole collimator is compared based on a imaging geometric model.
sentence.Network_cn: 在成像几何模型的基础上,通过分析和计算,研究了多针孔准直器与单针孔准直器对探测效率的影响.

means.word_mean: 1. a small telescope attached to a large telescope to use in setting the line of the larger one
2. optical device consisting of a tube containing a convex achromatic lens at one end and a slit at the other with the slit at the focus of the lens; light rays leave the slit as a parallel beam
